Control Name: 2.15.6 Azure Resource Tags are used to enrich resources with operational meta-data
Control Statement: Azure Tags provide the ability to associate critical meta-data as a name-value pair, such as billing information (e.g. cost center code), environment information (e.g. environment type), with Azure resources, resource groups, and subscriptions
